skillTree.localised_description: The armies of the Urfather spread their sickness with glee, earning Grandfather Nurgle's approval with every new infection.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The terrible stench that emanates from Eogric's open guts gives his victims advance warning of his approach, but once the executioner begins his relentless advance, nothing stays his hand.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Those who fall beneath the axe of Eogric are drawn into its blade, making the vile weapon stronger with each passing death.

attributes.bullet_text: A unit with Executioner will execute units in combat below a 20% hit points threshold.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: The failure of a foe to lay down and die is of no moment to Eogric, for he will continue in his duties regardless of the cost. Those who have been marked shall perish, regardless of the harm to himself.
The grandfather of all showers blessings upon his favourite children, and Eogric has risen to their ranks.
The mighty club in Drulg's hands can shatter even the hardiest of bones, cracking them open so he can sup on the marrow within.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: To be the executioner of all that Nurgle surveys, Eogric must be able to meet his foes on common ground.
Standing face to face with your enemy means getting to watch the light fade from their eyes when you win.
A leader is needed on the field of battle, able to rally the forces of Chaos in even the most dire situations.
Every dark army requires a particularly twisted mind, capable of thinking three steps ahead of the enemy.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a reeking and repulsive stench might kill every enemy before combat even commences.
Acidic ichor corrodes through enemy armour, leaving them vulnerable to the fatal strike.

ui_effects.localised_text: Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker

skillTree.localised_description: "Succumb to pestilence! Let Grandfather Nurgle feed on your suffering!"
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Eogric the Vile, a loathsome executioner pledged to the service of Gutrot Spume, stands as a grotesque embodiment of Nurgle's foul blessings. Swathed in tattered and filth-ridden garments, Eogric's hulking frame is a testament to the relentless decay that courses through his veins. His plague-ridden axe, eternally dripping with corrosive toxins, reaps a ghastly toll on the battlefield, leaving behind a wake of bloated corpses and infectious pestilence. A hooded cowl shrouds Eogric's face, revealing only the sickly pallor of his skin and the unsettling glow of his malevolent eyes. As Gutrot Spume's devoted enforcer, Eogric carries out his master's vile commands with a perverse zeal, spreading Nurgle's gift of decay and despair wherever he treads, his very presence a harbinger of impending doom for all who oppose the forces of Chaos.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison
